abstract: Immigration appeals court upholds Judge Michael C Horn's 2014 decision to deport former El Salvador defense minister Gen Jose Guillermo Garcia based on his involvement in 1980 killing of four American citizens and other human rights crimes.
lead_paragraph: An immigration appeals court has upheld an immigration judge’s deportation order against a former defense minister of El Salvador, Gen. José Guillermo García, based on his role assisting in the 1980 murders of four American churchwomen.

headline.main: Deportation of Former Salvadoran Official Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Deportation of Former Salvadoran Official Is Upheld

snippet: An immigration appeals court has upheld an immigration judge’s deportation order against a former defense minister of El Salvador, Gen. José Guillermo García, based on his role assisting in the 1980 murders of four American churchwomen.
